Posts.EditableText: Good evening everyone, today i uploaded a 30 minutes tutorial video on how to creat an interactive fiction with squiffy. https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=axT08_w_f2w At the end of the video i give a quick example on how i used javascript to communicate with Google Streetview so that i could use the gmap3 jquery plugin together with squiffy for my http://www.mynameishunt.com game.
Posts.HTML:
Good evening everyone,
today i uploaded a 30 minutes tutorial video on how to creat an interactive fiction with squiffy.
https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=axT08_w_f2w

At the end of the video i give a quick example on how i used javascript to communicate with Google Streetview
so that i could use the gmap3 jquery plugin together with squiffy for my http://www.mynameishunt.com game.
